text: Felt thereâ€™s more judgement rather than empathy, warmth, acceptance and love overall; not much support for couples of different beliefs.  I was removed from a woman to woman group without prior notification even when my church membership is still in place.  More can be done to make especially newcomers feel accepted and welcome, rather than self serving and ticking off service boxes.  I pray for the Holy Spirit to revive this church, also all other bodies of the Christ in the same plight.

I don't want to write a review about the church. How can I? It is always the best place.
However I go to PPHC often because my daughter studies there. And I found the staff is so considerate and warm. Makes me feel so loved and cared for. Okay! No wonder I believe that's the case in all the churches
Nice! Attended DR ang Yong Guan's TALK
Welcoming community who loves God and people. Sound teaching and people who challenge you to grow spiritually.
Friendly and welcoming. Makes me feel like I am home. :))
